text:
Привет!
Ищу *Middle DS с уклоном в NLP.*
Компания: Xerox PARC
*Город:* любой, ремоут
*Вилка* :fork:*:* 170-200к, почасовая оплата с переходом на фул тайм после пробного периода
*Основные DS-задачи:*
• работа с большими объемами текстовых документов (десятки Gb) 
• проверка гипотез
• проведение экспериментов с SOTA NLP моделями (BERT)
*Обязанности:*
• Разработка алгоритмов и моделей для решения задач анализа текстовых документов: классификация, NER, ранжирование
• Развитие и расширение существующих технических решений на основе анализа текстовой информации
• Реализация прототипов и промышленных решений
*Требования:*
• Высшее образование
• Опыт решения NLP задач с использованием DL: GloVe/ELMo/BERT
• Опыт применения Python для обработки и анализа данных: Pandas, NumPy, SсiPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow/Keras/PyTorch и т.д.
• Технический английский
*Будет плюсом:*
• разговорный английский
Резюме присылайте на: <mailto:andrew@softhousegroup.com|andrew@softhousegroup.com>. Вопросы в личку.

text:
*Looking for* :bert:Senior Data Scientist
*Location:* :uk: London, UK (visa sponsorship is available)
*Company:* <https://feedstock.com>
*Vilka*: £80k-£110k

FeedStock provides data-driven business intelligence to enterprise clients in finance and beyond, to dramatically improve productivity, meet compliance requirements and drive profitability. We work with some of the world’s largest financial institutions, integrating into their IT infrastructure to capture, analyse and understand the structured and unstructured data generated by their communication streams. This role presents an opportunity to join a team of very senior python developers and become part of a company at a very exciting time in its journey.

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist to join FeedStock’s data science team and help shape the direction of the company’s deep learning initiatives. The successful candidate will have experience in a similar seniority level and be able to help shape the AI roadmap of the company.

*Requirements:*
 - 5+ years’ industry experience in AI research and development
 - Experience in delivering AI projects, and managing people a plus
 - Strong hands-on experience in Machine Learning and Deep Learning applications (especially to NLP)
 - Technical expertise across areas of AI application domains
 - Experience building, deploying and maintenance of deep learning models in production
 - Good hands-on experience with NLP tasks (such as sequence classification and NER)
 - Good hands-on experience implementing and training deep learning models
 - Excellent knowledge of Python and Pytorch (preferably) or Tensorflow
 - Good knowledge of SQL and shell is a plus
 - Knowledge of good development practices (unittest, git, agile)
 - Knowledge of AWS
 - Experience training predictive analytics models and/or recommendation engines is a plus

*Responsibilities:*
 - Maintain and improve FeedStock’s NLP models
 - Collaborate with the labelling team to create and curate NLP datasets
 - Collaborate with the product manager and development team
 - Build and mentor the data science team
 - Implement new algorithms and train bespoke language models to deliver best-in-class NLP

*What you get:*
 - Dynamic, agile working environment
 - One day working from home per week
 - Private health insurance
 - Childcare benefits
 - 25 annual days’ holiday
 - Training budget and 3 days’ additional leave to attend conferences
 - Competitive salary and bonus

Drop your CV to <mailto:info@feedstock.com|info@feedstock.com> with a subject like "Job Application: Senior Data Scientist" or ask me anything in the :thread-please:.
